smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function onPerformSync appears to be too complex.
The function resourcesListener appears to be too complex.
The function checkCollectionEnabled appears to be too complex.
The function onMenuItemClick appears to be too complex.
The function infoListener appears to be too complex.
The function resourcesListener appears to be too complex.
The function isEnabled appears to be too complex.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function onPerformSync is nested too deeply.
Function checkCollectionEnabled is nested too deeply.
Function infoListener is nested too deeply.
Function isEnabled is nested too deeply.

smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication
smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class MainActivity is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: LabeledExpression
smells.description: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

instances.message: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionCaught
smells.description: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

instances.message: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

smells.name: FunctionMaxLength
smells.description: Function names should not be longer than the maximum set in the project configuration.

instances.message: Function names should be at most 30 characters long.
Function names should be at most 30 characters long.
Function names should be at most 30 characters long.

smells.name: MatchingDeclarationName
smells.description: If a source file contains only a single non-private top-level class or object, the file name should reflect the case-sensitive name plus the .kt extension.

instances.message: The file name 'DecsyncUtils.kt' does not match the name of the single top-level declaration 'CalendarDecsyncUtils'.
The file name 'DecsyncUtils.kt' does not match the name of the single top-level declaration 'ContactDecsyncUtils'.
The file name 'DecsyncUtils.kt' does not match the name of the single top-level declaration 'Extra'.

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: context.getSystemService(Context.NOTIFICATION_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to NotificationManager.
getSystemService(Context.POWER_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to PowerManager.
parent cannot be safely cast to ListView.
list.adapter cannot be safely cast to ArrayAdapter<CollectionInfo>.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: android.content.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
at.bitfire.ical4android.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
kotlinx.serialization.json.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.content.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.view.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.widget.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
at.bitfire.vcard4android.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
org.decsync.cc.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
